comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Homer Eaton Keyes (1875-1938), author and professor at Dartmouth, founder and editor of the magazine "Antiques."  His sister was scheduled to marry Dr. William Sheafe Chase, the very prominent rector of Christ Church in Brooklyn, in 1912, as reported in the New York Times.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia biography for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homer_Eaton_Keyes
